video.title: Wakfu
video.synopsis: Yugo, a 12-year old Eliatrope with special powers, sets out on a mission to find his true family and uncover the mysteries of Wakfu.

episodes.synopsis: Young Yugo's life is forever changed when he discovers that he can create teleportation portals.
episodes.title: The Child from the Mist

episodes.synopsis: Yugo, Percedal and Ruel enter the Forbidden Forest, looking for a way to cure a mysterious disease.
episodes.title: Yugo the Eliatrope

episodes.synopsis: Yugo and his friends travel to the market in Kelba to find a magical map but find it haunted by the Black Crow.
episodes.title: The Black Crow

episodes.synopsis: On his way to the Island of Oma, Percedal is taken prisoner and trapped in a bewitched tower.
episodes.title: The Ugly Pageant

episodes.synopsis: Yugo and his friends decide to defend the weak Puddlies, who are being bullied by the strong but stupid Taures.
episodes.title: The Magnificent Five

episodes.synopsis: On their way to the Island of Oma, Yugo and his friends stop in the gloomy village of Forfut and encounter the terrible Count Vampyro.
episodes.title: Vampyro

episodes.synopsis: Yugo and friends must find an antidote to save Amalia after she is poisoned by a demonic rose.
episodes.title: Poisonous Beauty

episodes.synopsis: When Yugo and his friends visit a village of bakers, they meet Xav, who is preparing for the Best Bread competition.
episodes.title: Xav the Baker

episodes.synopsis: Ruel is pushed to the limit by a gifted and illusive burglar, but the old Enutrof has more than one secret in his bag.
episodes.title: Ruel's Bag

episodes.synopsis: Yugo and his friends must win the final match of Gobbowl to buy a ship that can get them to Oma.
episodes.title: The Gobbowl Inferno - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: An older Ruel takes the field against the young team of Lamechester United, convinced he can win.
episodes.title: The Gobbowl Inferno - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Ruel decides to bring Yugo, Amalia and Evangelyne into the Gobbowl match against Lamechester United.
episodes.title: The Gobbowl Inferno - Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Yugo and his friends finally get their ship and set sail toward the Island of Oma. But an unexpected mysterious passenger is also on board.
episodes.title: Calm Blue Sea

episodes.synopsis: When a storm shipwrecks our heroes on an island, they are taken hostage to be sacrificed by the Kanniballs.
episodes.title: Moon Island

episodes.synopsis: After being attacked by a sea monster, Yugo and friends are washed ashore on their destination: the island of Oma.
episodes.title: Adamai

episodes.synopsis: While Yugo explores Oma with Adamai, his friends discover the ruins of a temple that are guarded by a fierce dragon.
episodes.title: The Eliacube

episodes.synopsis: Lost in the North, Yugo and his friends wait for the outcome of the battle between Grougaloragran and Nox. The World of 12 is at stake!
episodes.title: Grougaloragran the Eternal

episodes.synopsis: Yugo and Adamai search for the Dofus, where Grougaloragran will reincarnate. Meanwhile, their friends start a journey to the Sadida Kingdom.
episodes.title: The Brotherhood of the Tofu

episodes.synopsis: While Yugo and Adamai continue their search for the Dofus, Amalia returns home, where her brother rules the Sadida Kingdom while the king is away.
episodes.title: The Sadida Kingdom

episodes.synopsis: Amalia and Evangelyne reach the Tree of Life, heart of the Sadida Kingdom, to warn the king against an imminent attack from Nox.
episodes.title: The Tree of Life

episodes.synopsis: Yugo and Adamai arrive on the island where Grougaloragran hides his Dofus, but Igol, Nox's vicious bloodhound, is also there.
episodes.title: Igol

episodes.synopsis: After wandering the desert near his late master's grave, Percedal will finally learn how to become a true Shushu Guardian.
episodes.title: Rubilax

episodes.synopsis: Yugo and Adamai finally come to the secret sanctuary where Grougaloragran keeps his Dofus hidden.
episodes.title: The Quest for the Dofus

episodes.synopsis: As the Kingdom of Sadida readies for war, they must prevent Nox's Clock from reaching the island.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Nox arrives on the island and attacks its target: the Wakfu of the Tree of Life. But the Brotherhood of the Tofu, now reunited, shall prevail.
episodes.title: I Am  A Legend

episodes.synopsis: Yugo and Adamai must reach the Eliacube, the power of the Xelor, to win the final battle over the Tree of Life.
episodes.title: Mount Zinit

episodes.synopsis: The heroes head for the kingdom of Sadida to relax after their battle with Nox, but find their vacation cut short by new dangers.
episodes.title: Monsters and Chimeras

episodes.synopsis: While seeking her true love, Evangelyne is lured from her path by specters that may be the work of the diabolical Rogues.
episodes.title: Rubilaxia

episodes.synopsis: Rubilax uses Percedal for his evil plans, and Evangelyne tries to shake the phantoms by following shushu hunter Remington Smisse.
episodes.title: Remington Smisse

episodes.synopsis: Now that Evangelyne has rescued Percedal's soul, she must find a way to imprison Rubliax once again.
episodes.title: The Return of Percedal

episodes.synopsis: Reunited once more and ready to return to the kingdom of Sadida, the adventurers find out the hard way how not to satisfy their hunger.
episodes.title: The Dragon Pig

episodes.synopsis: Once again in the kingdom of Sadida, Yugo and Adamai use the Eliacube to discover the truth about their origins, but their curiosity comes at a price.
episodes.title: Qilby

episodes.synopsis: A cable car provides the first leg of a quest to find Qilby's Dofus, which is intended to rescue the Eliatrope children.
episodes.title: Ambush

episodes.synopsis: Percedal attempts to rescue Rubilax before Justice Knight can find him to dole out his punishment, but the shushu isn't the only one in danger.
episodes.title: Justice Knight

episodes.synopsis: Yugo, Percedal, Grany and Remington find themselves plunging into the hell-like realm of Rushu, the Shustuft Crust.
episodes.title: The World of Rushu

episodes.synopsis: The adventurers' journey takes them to the city of Brakmar, home to the Gobbowl -- but also to thieves, con artists and other nefarious types.
episodes.title: Kriss Krass

episodes.synopsis: In order to save Kriss, the heroes must play a legendary match against the brutal Brak'n'Black team and their leader, the Masked Gobbowler.
episodes.title: The Masked Gobbowler

episodes.synopsis: The Masked Gobbowler is hiding something scandalous that could be lethal for the adventurers -- but all will be settled on the game field.
episodes.title: The Emporg

episodes.synopsis: The adventurers make their way to the valley of Pandalucia, known for its wondrous beauty, only to find it far from their expectations.
episodes.title: The Night of the Thirsters

episodes.synopsis: Yugo and his team stop for the night in Mashville, where Ruel's old friend, the innkeeper Phil Harmonic, is busy preparing for a popular talent show.
episodes.title: The Voice Thief

episodes.synopsis: When they land on the island of the Wabbits, the heroes meet Wa Wabbit, the former ruler, who's on a personal quest to return to the throne.
episodes.title: Wabbit Island

episodes.synopsis: Thirsty and exhausted, the heroes make their way through a barren wasteland to a fountain, only to find it cursed and guarded by a fearsome warrior.
episodes.title: The Cursed Fountain

episodes.synopsis: Each class of the World of the Twelve sends a delegate to the kingdom of Sadida, where they plan to discuss what will become of the Eliatropes.
episodes.title: The Council of Twelve

episodes.synopsis: The adventurers arrive at the Trool Fair theme park on Ga Ga Island, where they encounter the larva races, the GladiaTrool Arena and more.
episodes.title: Cleome

episodes.synopsis: The adventurers finally arrive at Rogue-controlled Haven Port, where they must find a ship they can sail to Crimson Claws island.
episodes.title: A Fistful of Kamas

episodes.synopsis: The adventurers set sail on Black Ink's ship for the final leg of their journey, and Qilby, Adamai and Grougaloragran discover the Zinith ship.
episodes.title: The Zinit

episodes.synopsis: The adventurers wash up on the shores of a strange island. It seems to have plenty of food, but can the natives be trusted?
episodes.title: Bellaphone Island

episodes.synopsis: Yugo and the team meet the governor of Breta, who's so outrageously self-centered that he's bringing the whole place down.
episodes.title: The Silence of the Rings

episodes.synopsis: Yugo and his fellow heroes reach Crimson Claws Island, which is under siege by bombs made with advanced technology.
episodes.title: The Crimson Claws

episodes.synopsis: Rushu and his wicked minions have brought the World of the Twelve to its knees, and the ultimate battle unfolds on the island.
episodes.title: Phaerys the Mighty

episodes.synopsis: Yugo must keep a backstabbing Eliatrope from activating the Zinith ship amid the raging battle on Crimson Claws Island.
episodes.title: The White Dimension

episodes.synopsis: Yugo and Qilby find themselves pulled into a dimension where reality isn't what it seems, and Percedal and Goultard continue the battle against Rushu.
episodes.title: The Eliatropes
